CustomField.description: Case In Legal determines whether the Case is In Legal stage and the logged user Role is not System Admin OR Claims Team or Lab Team.
CustomField.formula: Legal__c = true && ( $Profile.Name != 'Claims Manager' && $Profile.Name != 'Commercial Claims Rep' && $Profile.Name != 'Residential Claims Rep' && $Profile.Name != 'Lab Manager' && $Profile.Name != 'Lab Technician' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Permission.Can_View_Claims_while_in_Legal = false )
